description: Mystique (Raven Darkhölme) is a fictional character who appears in American comic books published by Marvel Comics, as well as in a number of movie, television, and video game adaptations, typically in fiction related to the X-Men. Created by artist David Cockrum and writer Chris Claremont, she first appeared in the comic book Ms. Marvel #16, published in 1978.Mystique is a member of a fictional sub-species of humanity known as "mutants", who are born with superhuman abilities.  Mystique is a shapeshifter who can mimic the appearance and voice of any person with exquisite precision. She is typically a villain and foe of the X-Men.
name: Mystique
